brewery.brewery_description: Manhattan's Brewery. Built To Serve The City.

location.venue_address: 445 Albee Square W, Dekalb Market Hall

beer.beer_description:
Intersect: Rotating Hop Series

What we love most about our city is its constant evolution. No two visits to a given 'hood are ever the same. We created Intersect to be just as dynamic - a sequence of hazy and bright Session IPAs that are light and refreshing enough to keep you moving. Each progression of the series is brewed with a unique combination of two of our favorite hops.

items.badge_description: Looking for the Untappd team? You’ll likely find us at our favorite places: West 4th / Jane in Santa Monica or The Pony Bars (either one) in NYC or Beer Noggin in Westchester, NY.
Thanks for drinking at The Pony Bar! Keep checking in to level up and don't forget to subscribe to our page for updates. Cheers!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 6)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 7!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 385 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 78!
Keep the party rolling all day long with your favorite low ABV session IPAs. That's 35 different beers with style of IPA - Session. Try 5 more for Level 8!

beer.beer_description: Our beer brewed for Pride month here in the city! A portion of all pint, 4-pack, and case sales are being donated to various LGBTQ causes around the city. We did a HUGE batch of this, so it's our #1 priority on draft in Soho for the month of June to help get the word out. We're extremely happy to lean into Pride 2021, as it's a cause near and dear to our core values as a business and the city we love.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 235 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 48!

Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 105 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 22!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 170 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 35! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 30 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 7!

beer.beer_description: Our Spring Ale is back! Inspired by the electric Bat Flips of the KBO, Bat Flip is a small tribute to our favorite sport here at Torch & Crown. Bat Flip is a lightly hazy, dry-hopped ale with a bright melon aroma and crisp finish.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 150 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 31.

beer.beer_description: Meaning "Street" in Italian - Strada is our take on an Italian Pils, a crisp an easy drinking style with a light dry hop

Torch & Crown announces our presence in the haze game with an IPA packing peach and grapefruit notes. We have grand ambitions of bringing beer right to the Heart of the City. Lofty goals of brewing closer to the action than anyone has before. This is our first beer release… we’re almost famous, right?

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 375 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 76!

beer.beer_description: Based on the Hawaiian juice "POG" whose bottle caps inspired the Pogs fad of the 90s - A Sour Ale brewed with Passion fruit, Orange, Guava and a touch of lactose

items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 35!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 175 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 36!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 300 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 61!

items.checkin_comment: Solid session IPA. Love Torch & Crown.

items.badge_description: Porters and Stouts are rich with both history and flavor. Roasty, dark, and delicious, these two styles helped start it all. That’s 220 different beers with the style of Porter or Stout. Try 5 more for Level 45!

items.badge_name: Beyond a Shadow of a Stout (Level 32)
items.badge_description: We all love Stouts, and now we have a dedicated badge to celebrate your dedication to these dark, top-fermented beer in multiple variations, like Oatmeal, Milk and more! Which one will you start with? That's 160 different beers with the style of Stout. Try 5 more for Level 33!

beer.beer_description: Based on the Hawaiian juice "POG" whose bottle caps inspired the Pogs fad of the 90s - A Sour Ale brewed with Passion fruit, Orange, Guava and a touch of lactose

user.bio:
Enjoying a beery lifestyle one deya at a time…
Now getting crooked at the crab instead!
user.location: Cheltenham UK - NO MORE - now Columbia, MD

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 29)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 30!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 60 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 13!
We believe in IPA and you should too. You certainly have a taste for the hops! That's 35 different IPAs. Try 5 more for Level 8! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 10 different venues categorized as a Brewery, Cidery or Meadery. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

What's better than enjoying a beer outside with food, music, games all in an enjoyable atmosphere? We couldn't think of anything. That's a beer at 5 different venues with the category of Beer Garden. Visit 5 more for Level 2!

beer.beer_description: Our beer brewed for Pride month here in the city! A portion of all pint, 4-pack, and case sales are being donated to various LGBTQ causes around the city. We did a HUGE batch of this, so it's our #1 priority on draft in Soho for the month of June to help get the word out. We're extremely happy to lean into Pride 2021, as it's a cause near and dear to our core values as a business and the city we love.

Our city has always taken commitment. Six story walk up? Tie your shoes. Subway car that's clearly at capacity? Shove your way in. The energy, the pulse...it's defined through centuries of hard work, diversity, and (not so) occasional 2 am street kebabs. Lagered for over 100 days, Tenement Pils is built for the city: a heartfelt declaration to the cause. No shortcuts, no substitutes.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 2)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 3!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 5 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 2!

You’ve pledged allegiance, and now it’s time to enjoy some beer! Now remember, not all American beer is fizzy and yellow. That’s 5 different beers from a brewery in the United States. Try 5 more for Level 2.

beer.beer_description: Torch & Crown announces our presence in the haze game with an IPA packing peach and grapefruit notes. We have grand ambitions of bringing beer right to the Heart of the City. Lofty goals of brewing closer to the action than anyone has before. This is our first beer release… we’re almost famous, right?

Our city has always taken commitment. Six story walk up? Tie your shoes. Subway car that's clearly at capacity? Shove your way in. The energy, the pulse...it's defined through centuries of hard work, diversity, and (not so) occasional 2 am street kebabs. Lagered for over 100 days, Tenement Pils is built for the city: a heartfelt declaration to the cause. No shortcuts, no substitutes.
A clean, lightly dry hopped, easy drinking summer ale.

Our beer brewed for Pride month here in the city! A portion of all pint, 4-pack, and case sales are being donated to various LGBTQ causes around the city. We did a HUGE batch of this, so it's our #1 priority on draft in Soho for the month of June to help get the word out. We're extremely happy to lean into Pride 2021, as it's a cause near and dear to our core values as a business and the city we love.

Our Spring Ale is back! Inspired by the electric Bat Flips of the KBO, Bat Flip is a small tribute to our favorite sport here at Torch & Crown. Bat Flip is a lightly hazy, dry-hopped ale with a bright melon aroma and crisp finish.
Light bodied and loaded with Citra + Nelson hops, Rainmaker is full of citrus flavor and aromas while remaining easy drinking.

Intersect: Rotating Hop Series

What we love most about our city is its constant evolution. No two visits to a given 'hood are ever the same. We created Intersect to be just as dynamic - a sequence of hazy and bright Session IPAs that are light and refreshing enough to keep you moving. Each progression of the series is brewed with a unique combination of two of our favorite hops.
Imperial Stout brewed with Coffee, Cacao, Vanilla and a touch of Lactose

Here at T&C, we love the idea of Après Ski. Whether you're heading out west, squeezing ten friends into a tiny cabin in Vermont, or spending the day carving through the snow (read: slush) of the NYC streets, nothing beats a cold beer after a day of snow. Grab an Après, get warm, and drink up.

Highbrow and lowbrow...that's our game. Like us, these two beers aren't fussy, exclusive, complicated, or unapproachable, but they speak to a simple idea: Everything we do at Torch & Crown should be surprisingly good. High Brau is aa smooth, clean festbier with a crisp, nutty malt character.

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: 8.4% DIPA packed with Motueka, Kohatu, Rakau, and Mosaic hops

We were going to name this beer Tiki Torch… yeah, that might sound kitschy, but trust us, it would have been sweet.  But it turns out there's already a gazillion beers named that, so we did what any serious brewery would do, and threw that name into an online Wu-Tang name generator. We're proud to introduce the result, X-pert Ambassador.  It's fruity, sour, and a little sweet, and packed with Mango and Pineapple.
Cream Ale - Made for Drinkin'

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: DDH DIPA with Sabro, Mosaic, and Amarillo
Single Hop NEIPA - DDH w/ Mosaic Hops

Sub Rosa means “done in secret.” This crisp lager is dry-hopped with Barbe Rouge hops from France to give it a pleasant berry tartness in the finish. It’s a nod to both New York City’s underground drinking culture – from prohibition era speakeasies to hidden neighborhood joints – and our own underground (and underage) brewing beginnings. It’s our ballad to those who strive for the seemingly unachievable.
American Adjunct Lager dry hopped with Mosaic

Ah...Fall in New York. That glorious time of year when you don't need to run the A/C on its highest setting to survive the night, your block smells a little more like bagels and a little less like garbage, and you finally remembered to hit the farmer's market just in time to catch the last few of the season. Celebrate the season with this Autumn Ale suited for a long session with friends.
Light bodied, light roast notes. Classic Porter

Intersect: Rotating Hop Series

What we love most about our city is its constant evolution. No two visits to a given 'hood are ever the same. We created Intersect to be just as dynamic - a sequence of hazy and bright Session IPAs that are light and refreshing enough to keep you moving. Each progression of the series is brewed with a unique combination of two of our favorite hops.  Intersect: Vic Secret+Citra has aromas of tropical fruit and pine, with huge flavors of nectarine, pineapple, and passionfruit.

We were originally supposed to open our taproom in June. But a brewery's job is quite literally to be facilitators of good times, and sometimes we gotta say "f*ck you" to a deadline or two to make that happen. Same goes for the beer. Yeast is a living thing and operates on it's own timeline. If it needs a couple more days to get there, then that's what it gets - hard deadlines be damned.
Named in honor of our brewery cat Elizabeth. On the border of English + American styles. English Malts add nice caramel/toffee notes while American hops add a fruity touch
Clean, Classic Helles Lager. Beer for drinking

beer.beer_style: IPA - Imperial / Double New England / Hazy
beer.beer_description: DDH DIPA w/ Galaxy, Mosaic, Vic Secret, and Simcoe hops
Based on the Hawaiian juice "POG" whose bottle caps inspired the Pogs fad of the 90s - A Sour Ale brewed with Passion fruit, Orange, Guava and a touch of lactose
